title: HOUR 3 - Bold Prediction for the College Football Playoff Semifinals
itunes:title: HOUR 3 - Bold Prediction for the College Football Playoff Semifinals
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, former USC quarterback, Heisman trophy winner and current FOX Sports college football analyst Matt Leinart joins Colin to preview the College Football Playoff semifinals and offer one very bold prediction. Finally, it's the last edition of the year for Tomorrow's Headlines Today with Jason McIntyre.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
